Name: The Defender: Farm and Castle
About the game: You are an archer who will protect the castle from the invasion of monsters. In the castle you can manage the resources, create space and harvest products. When you level up you will be able to learn new skills to fight with stronger enemies. 'The Defender: Farm and Castle' is a easy game to play and suitable for everyone. This game developed from the concept of tower defense style and shooting style, and we add character roles to make the game more fun.
